author: JOHN DANISZEWSKI
title: Zelenskyy's unlikely journey from comedy to Ukrainian hero
description: WARSAW, Poland (AP) — When Volodymyr Zelenskyy was growing up in southeastern Ukraine, his Jewish family spoke Russian and his father once forbade the younger Zelenskyy from going abroad to study in Israel.
